properties.markdownProperty:
As final solution the `i18n` directory in the archetypes repository is optional. It was implemented a new way to handle translations. This new method gives translations more flexibility when translating dynamic strings (archetype classes, properties names, properties categories, etc).
This method will handle translations strings codes like `main_window.title` as if they were keys in a dictionary. This is useful to keep simple the YAML file for static application strings. In order to handle dynamic data, it is possible to add "contexts" to the translation. Context are just prefix for the translation code that will be ignored if the translation is not found. Ignoring these translation codes gives the archetype creator the posibility to create the archetypes in one language directly writing in the XML archetypes files ignoring translations files, they will be displayed in the application as it is written in the XML.
